content.detailedDescription:
It was late evening around 10:30pm, 12/13/2013. i was heading
to bed. as i walked out the front door onto my decking
i looked up toward the s/w and i noticed a bright star
then it split up into three stars left center right of each
other. i ran inside to get my son so he can see what 
i saw. the lights moved around came together,
then seperated again then zipped away towards the 
south. this is the fourth time the lights appeared 
in the past two years around the same time.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: One light separated to three lights

content.detailedDescription: I was reading my tablet on my bed when i noticed a pulsating light out my south facing window. i reached for my glasses and noticed that there was more then one and the lights were pulsating. i assumed military but heard nothing as far as rotary or turbine. there was no wind to interfere with sound. i went downstairs and got the other occupants of the house to come outside and see what i was seeing. all of us witnessed(3 persons) the lights moving east to west in the south. the entire event lasted about 10-12 mins. outside there was no sound except traffic in the distance. still no sound from the direction or from the objects. i have seen things before but nothing this blatant. i did some communications with friends and one suggested this may be drones, since they are very quiet. but that is a possible explaination. i am not counting a military formation out.
content.summary: From my upstairs window i observed 6 to 8 pulsating red lights moving in a se to sw line formation at about 500+ knots

content.detailedDescription: I was taking out the trash around 10:05pm before clocking out and leaving work, and one of my coworkers was smoking a cigarette and waiting for his ride.  we simultaneously noticed a large aircraft over the ne horizon, seemingly proceeding sse.  i immediately recognized it as fitting the description of the ufo reports that had been coming out around the area through the preceding hour.  this was a relatively widespread sighting i had seen reported via social media before seeing it, myself.  one may conduct their own twitter search using the keywords "ufo" and "gardendale."  even the prominent weather reporter for our local abc affiliate was discussing this event on his public facebook page.  other accounts report more lights (in a fixed line) and noise, but the distance and angle possibly limited our perspective.  my coworker and i witnessed an extremely massive object which featured two visible lights, one on either end.  i would say it was shaped like a blimp or dirigible, except that it was angled like a ramp or a staircase (at least seemingly, from our vantage point).  the lower end was the leading end, and was demarcated by one dull and steady reddish light.  the higher end was trailing, and had its own light which flashed a more vivid red.  the object appeared solid, but it was so distant and dark that it could very well have been cargo suspended between two or more aircraft.  but this is speculation.  the sheer size of the object was staggering, spanning the apparent length of at least 10 small aircraft.  it seemed to be flying around standard cruising speed for a helicopter, over the subdivision of mountain brook on a course that would have taken it toward the cahaba heights area and eventually the vicinity of the us route 280/i-459 interchange.  we could hear no sound, and it soon disappeared behind trees and buildings.  as a footnote, i decided to report this because it seems no one else in my area did.  when i woke up this morning, i checked the last few mufon reports and there were no birmingham submissions; however, i couldn't help but notice the similarities in the georgia reports from last night.  my opinion, for what it may be worth, is that this is some large-scale military exercise, cargo haul or experimental aircraft testing.
content.summary: Large dark mass framed by lights or escorted/hauled by aircraft

content.detailedDescription: I saw a object come on like a fire ball by the saint lucie county airport right across from the old news station x34 i and my brother witness the event for about 10 minutes. the object came over the tree line shoot off when it got over head like a star. it made a sonic boom. but it came back when it was about 20 yards away it came back on like a fireball. i ran but my brother was frozen. he told me to come back when i was about 2 blocks away. i came back and asked him what it looked like he said it was a flying city. and i asked what they looked like he said you want believe it they look like me and you people was flying it. the only thing that was strange there was no traffic no cars and the street is a busy road way. and we was standing on a little bridge. i know it was a lost of time and i just want to know what happened.I know the people at the airport tower witness it. but no one came forward. and i don`t want to be laughed at. i am a ex jet mechanic. i never saw anything like this in my life. i know more happened and i think they did something more than just what i appeared to see. i saw you guys on tv and would love to talk to a hypnotis and take a lie detector and you will find your prof for real this time.I have told people but one guy siad he and some guys was in town and saw the object that we came in contact with. all i want is to know what happened that night. if not i will live with it. i don`t know but it has been a lot of years but it is like yesterday
content.flightPath: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Fireball lost of time need to be under hypnosis and lie detector test

content.detailedDescription: Video of event described in case # 53486 the event starts about 1:40 into the video. about one minute, and 40 seconds in is when the lights i am talking about begin.
content.summary: Case # 53486

content.detailedDescription:
I had just got home with the kids. i went inside and the two teenage girls went to check the mail. suddenly they started knocking on the kitchen window and called for me to go outside. i went outside with my younger daughter and saw them pointing at a large object in the sky. the object was orange/yellow in color. it was a disc/sphere. it looked like fire was coming out from the bottom. at first i thought it was a hot air ballon, but it was moving too fast. it travelled toward us, faster than a hot air balloon but slower than an airplane. it made no noise. it hovered near us for a few moments before it shot straight up into the air at a very high rate of speed. then it changed direction to the right and appeared more white in color. then it faded out of sight. the girls said that it changed directions and descended again over the trees and faded out, but i did not see that happen.

we watched the object for several minutes before it shot of into the sky. my daughter took a couple of pictures with her cell phone. we really couldn't get a good shot to tell what it was or see any other details.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Kids and mom saw object hoovering and moving closer, then suddenly shot up toward the sky and changed direction again.

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving home down a dark back road so there were no lights out. for some reason i looked up to my left and along with many aircraft flying all over the sky with their blinking lights i saw a huge formation of lights in a long line.   there were at least 10-15 red lights in a row pulsating but sequentially. they were very dim and almost looked like it would just fade out any minute. when i spotted it i immediately said "what the hell is that" and i never say hell. immediately i thought...Wait, maybe it is a string of lights over a production plant (because there were several in the area) that i never had noticed befor. i thought it was part of a tower even though the lights were horizontal. so i thought maybe they were on the top of a very tall fence or strung across something. it looked pretty close and low.  when i went down hill, it went behind the trees and when i popped up it had moved. this continued and i continued watching it move steadily across in front of me and continue to my right. i was travelling due west and it went from south to north so now i knew it was not stationary lights but it moved so slowly it was hard to tell it was not stationary. also now i could see it in relation to planes flying overhead and could tell it was much further out then they were. i kept saying in awe..."what the heck is that???" 

 
i was driving so i couldnt count the lights and study it for a long time. i had to keep looking at the road so i wouldnt wreck and i didnt want to pull over on a narrow shoulder on this dark road. i noticed that it looked like it was in fog so i thought the sky must be hazy but after i got to where i could no longer see it, i looked up and noticed that all the planes and stars were very bright. the sky was crystal clear with a very bright moon.

the reason i lost it is because i came into my town which not only was brightly lit but i couldnt see beyond the tree line now. it was too far to the north and trees were surrounding me.

i was thinking this thing was either a formation of many crafts or it was one huge craft that had many lights outlining it. it really looked like it was probably a massive craft with lights on it. i got that impression because there was also a light in front of it (not red) and also because the lights stayed in such a perfect straight line. it moved very very slowly and if it was so far away that it looked hazy and slow, then that means it was far bigger than i thought. one of the red lights was not much smaller than the planes in the sky so if you can imagine at least 10-15 red lights in a row that is one big ufo. 

even if i had taken a picture, it wouldn���t have turned out because the lights were so dim, not at all bright like the planes. 

i was really amazed the whole time and was very hyper when i got home telling my husband all about it and emailing my mom. i told my so as soon as he got home. i am still stunned and will keep checking our local area to see if anyone else spotted it.
content.summary: Large light formation that resembled nothing that could be explained traveling accross the sky with unusual unfamiliar characteristics.

content.detailedDescription: I was looking out window at the holiday inn we were staying at as we were returning from a class reunion in boston,ma. i noticed a green flickering of a green florcent round green light. it was in back of a flag blowing at the end of a pier. i noticed it was moving right to left and dissapered when it moved in back of a restaurant which was on the front of the pier. it then appeared and moved slowly for about 30 seconds and dissapered it may have went into the water but i could not tell as it was 12 am and dark, very strange
content.summary: Round green well defined glowilg circular light moving i was looking out the window of the hotel we were staying at while on vacation

content.detailedDescription: I was driving, turn right off hwy 316 going east on sugarloaf pkwy...In lawrenceville heading toward grayson, ga at approx 812pm on 1/15/14...2 red lights on the left 1 white light in the middle 3 red lights on the right red lights were blinking white light was solid horizontal in the sky..There was a plane flying looked like above behind it...It was not a plane...And it was like 10-15x longer than the plane..The red lights on the left the last 2 were blinking together and the one closest to white solid was blinking offset..The lights were in a straight line and were spaced out like this: . . . . . . 1st 2 were red, middle was white last 3 red...It was not moving..There was a plane moving and this was not 5 mins later i didnt see it again
content.summary: White and red horizontal lights in the sky on a cloudless clear night .

content.detailedDescription:
When i fsigobserved tbecausestrange flames in the sky my fiance and me were pulling into the parking lot of wallmart we sat in the car and watched it mo e intelligentally around the roof of wallmart and then we watched it blink out.
what made me first notice it was how it was so bright and low to the roof of wallmart.
we were really baffled because it was moving like it was looking for something.
the object looked like a floating candle flame that was really bright and then we watched it blink out.
we were really shocked and excited at the same time.
we lost sight of it because it just blinked out.
content.summary: My father and i have had three total sightings of these candle flame lights some up close and some 500ft in the sky

content.detailedDescription: I suddenly felt the urge to go outside.  i asked my wife to get the night vision  video equipment.  i went outside and looked to the north.  the moon was full.  little or no wind.  clear for the most part.  i witnessed an orange sphere  that  de materialized from sight.  my wife came out and we were both looking north.    i began video taping the event and scanning the northern sky.  we then noticed some bright flashing lights to the north.  three at first.  then right behind the three flashing lights, we spotted an orange sphere.  it was followed by a smaller red light or sphere.  that was followed by another flashing light.   the flashing lights were noticeably smaller than the larger orange and slightly smaller red spheres. they were proceeding  slowly to the west.  the duration of the event was about 10 and a half minutes of video.   straight line path.  they flew behind some clouds but i continued the video until they became visible again.  the distance was pretty far, but the orange sphere was about the size of an aspirin.  clearly round.  very excited to have it on video at last.  we lost sight of the objects due to trees to our west.  also, there has been a good amount of military aircraft in the skies this evening.  more than usual.    i will provide the video after i have been contacted.
content.summary: Orange sphere and red sphere escorted by 4 flashing lights.

content.detailedDescription: I was standing outside,my boyfriend and i observed a starlike entity flying westward, we were noticing all the sky action,lots of planes out at the time, when we observed the first object. it was only visible to us maybe 5-10 seconds before it disappeared. about 1 minute later i observed what i first thought was a plane,east of the first object, it was very bright,like the headlight of a plane, i started to tell my boyfriend to look up but before i could say it,the second object disappeared just as sudden as it had shown up.
content.summary: Watched two star like objects fly across the sky then disappear

content.detailedDescription:
When i fsigobserved tbecausestrange flames in the sky my fiance and me were pulling into the parking lot of wallmart we sat in the car and watched it mo e intelligentally around the roof of wallmart and then we watched it blink out.
what made me first notice it was how it was so bright and low to the roof of wallmart.
we were really baffled because it was moving like it was looking for something.
the object looked like a floating candle flame that was really bright and then we watched it blink out.
we were really shocked and excited at the same time.
we lost sight of it because it just blinked out.
content.summary: My father and i have had three total sightings of these candle flame lights some up close and some 500ft in the sky

content.detailedDescription: I was heading out to get a newspaper when i looked left to make sure no cars were coming before i turned. this ifs when i saw 8 red lights in a triangle pattern, they appeared to be stationary. i tried to photograph it but was unable to see anything, so i turned on my video camera but then nothing. at this point in time it started to move so i drove to another street in a clearing to watch it. there was no noise, just red lights, they seemed to fixed bit there was others that were moving. only red lights, no other colors. i tried to video it again but still couldn't see it. it eventually after about 7 minutes flew off/disappears above trees heading toward shaw afb. when i turned to try to find it i couldn't, it was gone. i wanted so bad to record it and to prove what i saw but my phone doesn't take good pictures/videos at night, i was so upset.
content.summary: Saw lights in a triangular form, just above the tee lines. tried to photograph and video it but i couldn't get it with my phone. followed it moving slowly until it disappeared. was going in direction of shaw afb.

content.detailedDescription: Witnessed first string of red and white lights at 8:25 pm followed by second much larger streak of lights at 8:30 pm. the event lasted about 10 mins total, lights were red in the front of the craft and solid and white in the back and blinking. lights appeared to be connected as one very large aircraft definitely not airplanes or other natural phenomena. craft hovered slowly over my house into the horizon. craft was completely silent and appeared to be extremely large. a feeling of fear arose when i realized that the craft was not airplanes flying in formation as i had thought when i first saw the craft. extremely unusual thing to see in the sky, craft was witnessed by multiple family members and no one could identify the craft.
content.summary: Two extremely large aircraft with blinking lights, definitely not airplanes.

content.detailedDescription:
White light. accompanied by red blinking light above near by   . the white light landed in wooded area near my home then rose above tree tops and moved over to neighbors back yard and landed again

1--looking out kitchen window

2--white light wear there shouldnt be one

3--thought is was someone with flash light

4--the object was on the ground and stayed there for ten minutes, then lifted above tree tops and moved about 50 yds. and landed in neighbors yard.

5--amazed

6-- the light just went out but the red blinking light stayed and not sure what it did but was gone a few minutes later
content.summary: White light

content.detailedDescription:
My boyfriend and i were at his backyard on his nephew's trampoline, talking and enjoying the stars that were appearing in the twilight. my boyfriend hasn't got the best eyesight because i pointed out a dim lit star and he couldn't see it. 

next was a bright light that my boyfriend couldn't see as well. with the random light came a thin triangle which was hard to see but just managed to tell the shape, it was like a paper plane if you saw it from the bottom. the light and the shape moved north from south in a slow-ish pace, but a bit faster than a passenger plane.

i yelled out to my boyfriend whilst pointing to the light and following every move "look, look that light, its so bright, its moving, that's not a star. argh its gone its gone didn't you see it?!" turns out he didn't see the craft.

the light shrunk and disappeared as if it was a dying touch. as well the thin triangle shape, as if it went on some invisible thing. as well this shape didn't make a noise. 

also the location i live and the location i saw this craft is 2 hours away from the nearest domestic airport. there is rarely any air traffic, if there is, it is mostly helicopters.
content.summary: Thin triangle, bright light, invisible

content.detailedDescription: At roughly 11:30 pm june 17, 2013, (a sunday night) seven circular objects flew in a straight line from ssw to nne direction. first two went by one following the other; i jumped out of my hot tub and got my cell phone and took on picture of them with the flash on. (by the way, i do not drink and was fully awake and alert when this took place.) then 5 others equally spaced on the same trajectory passed by with no sound. i tried to take pictures with the flash off and zoomed the samsung galaxy siii camera using my fingers on the screen. i took several, three or four, more pictures but thought i did not get anything until someone else helped me a week later zoom the black pics until the objects appeared. the objects appeared to the naked eye as all having yellow pinwheels from the outside to the center of the bottom of the disc; at the center of the bottom of the disc, were three of four different colored lights including red, blue and green inside a small circle. however, the disc objects appeared in the pictures entirely different than they appeared to the naked eye. the pictures show a circular object with a plasma like coloring with none of the shapes or colors that were vividly seen with the naked eye. one picture appears to catch the edge of one disc or it is a multiple exposure of one disc that appears as a curve. most importantly, these craft had no wings, no running lights like normal aircraft and made no sound. but the trajectory of these brightly colored disc was the same as military transport aircraft flew the day before i saw these objects. these objects appeared to be the same altitude and were twice the size of the multi-engine transport military aircraft and were gaining altitude similar to the military aircraft as they crossed the horizon from ssw to nne. again, these objects clearly were circular, with no wings, or tails and no running lights like all aircraft have. i have not reported this until now because i thought they may be some type of new military disc craft because they were flying in the same flight path of military transport aircraft heading nne. but watching a mufon show about sighting in bucks county, pa, i thought everyone should know these disc objects crossed the central new jersey sky. again, the pictures appear to show plasma like circular objects, while looking at them with the naked eye, they were clearly outlined as circular disc with yellow lights in a pin wheel and small colored lights in the center of the disc. perhaps the roswell craft has been reversed engineered and we now have this new secret capability.
content.summary: 2 circular disc in line; followed by 5 more disc in line equally spaced.

content.detailedDescription: I was around 13 or 14 yrs old sleeping over at my friends house across the street. it was late at night and i was trying to sleep in the east basement bedroom next to my friends room. he was already asleep. i always had a hard time sleeping away from home. i was laying on the couch under the window and heard a tapping on the glass. i looked through the blinds to see a disk around 4 to 5 inches in diameter that had a bright neon green glow to it. it tapped  on the window 3 or 4 times and flew out into the front yard and flew around for a minute. it was a little erratic and very fast zigging and zagging around the yard. from somewhere nearthe center of the yard it shot straight up and flew over the house. i ran into my friends bedroom where he was still asleep and looked out through his blinds where i watched the object erratically fly around the back yard. this lasted around a minute and it shot straight up into the sky until it was out of view. i remember thinking someone was messing with me at first and i felt a little scared but fascinated. the feeling that someone was messing with me only lasted a second because once i saw how agile and fast this was i knew nothing man made could accomplish what i was seeing! this thing could move 10 feet or more effortlessly in the blink of an eye and stop in mid air on a dime! it was faster than anything i've ever seen! i couldn't hear any sound as i was inside the house and the object was outside  but i'm not sure it made any sound at all. i realize no proof can come from this and i have no proof that this even happened. i also realize how this sounds being as it is coming from a childhood memory from someone that was trying to sleep at the time. i know this happened and i remember it almost like it was yesterday. i just mainly would like to know if anyone has ever had a similar experience? has anything like this ever been reported? i don't want to waste anyone's time with this and i don't expecta response but if anyone has heard of something like this happening and could respond i would love to hear back. thank you!
content.summary: It tapped on window, flew outto front yard, shot up over house to back yard, flew around and shot straight upand disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: There were three unidentified objects all three white but the last seen object hovered over my house and my kids observed it. as the kids observed the third object rise from the ground the objects appearance  was white with blk dots and a red glow. the third ufo then made a whistling noise and sped out at unknown speed in the south direction the same as the second object. i observed the object slowly travelind to the south and the object size was massive. the object appeared to look like a comet. i am a trained forward observer united states army veteran and according to your office. i have had various encounters with ebe i also have given my report to the mufon organization apparently the object was over my house for some reason. i would like to gi on record that i turned down the offer to be a field investigator because of  the death threats in the past but now i would love to tell my story please contact me. i have pictures of the ufo and entities that abducted the plane as well while i was traveling to korea.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Ufo's were white one was white with blk dots and red behind it. the ufo lifted off the ground and speed off at unknown speed and reappeared.

content.detailedDescription: Having a cigarette on my porch during a party  at 5 30 am saturday morning when a very,very large object slowly came over my house i was not really concerned living next to an airport  so i started looking for white and red flashing lights i did not see any, so then the object hovered over my house i could not hear any noise at all and i just stood there wanting to get my camera but it was as if my feet was frozen to the porch when it started to move south i ran inside got my camera and told the other people in my house we rushed outside and saw the object traveling along the coastline it was still visible 3 to 5 miles away, smaller but visible to us i videod  object   and 3 days later when i went to show someone, the video was gone from my cell phone ,now the reason i am telling you this is to find out if anybody else reported same sighting thank you in advance for your help stephen
content.summary: An hovering object over my house

content.detailedDescription:
I was standing just my door of my garage on the north side of my house smoking a cigarette because i do not smoke inside. i first noticed the object coming from the west. i first noticed the object because it was moving too slow and did not have the usual navigation or strobe lights. the object moved silently to the north. the were two triangular isosceles shaped vehicles. the lead vehicle had soft white lights on each point. the second vehicle was just below with it's lead point just below and seemed to just about touch the lead vehicle. the vehicle had no lights on it's points but did have a large pulsating light in its middle. it reminded me of military c5 aircraft refueling an awacs, however, i could not see any connection between the two. my view of these crafts was enhanced by light pollution from the city which gave the sky a light gray hue. there was no noise at all on its flight path which was slow and straight. my feelings was one of wonder and a strange feeling as to who or what was flying this thing and also i was wondering if any one else had seen it.  i think about this event all the time. i cannot forget it. i called a friend who lived about three miles northeast of my location immediately after i lost sight as it went beyond the tree line. she never caught sight of it. i was later interviewed by our local abc affiliated tv station which featured a program " strange lights over richmond".
i served in the navy as an aviation electricians mate and later as an army infantry officer. i still work for the department of defense and certify that everything that i have recounted is true.
i will even submit to hypnosis because i still have to know.
content.summary: Two triangular shaped objects flying in unison moving at about 25mph at about 150 ft in altitude.

content.detailedDescription: I was inside my home at around 9.00 pm in late summer - early fall 2008 when my son (who was 25 at that time) called me out to the deck on the back of the house and said "dad you should see this-its really weird" so i went outside and we both watched this round shaped object moved in a  straight line about 45 degrees above the horizon . we could not tell how big it was or how far away it was. we watched it move across the sky and all of a sudden six spikes of light ( three on each side about half the size of the object in length) appeared , we were fixated on this thing when it turned a bright orange-red color and after a few seconds it was gone! we looked at each other and agreed that this was a u.F.O   i went in the house and reported it on a u.F.O web site (don't remember which one) but never heard nothing back so i thought maybe it was a satellite or something identified. but, watching u.F.O.Shows on the military network today about the sightings in 2008 got me to report it again. i was 51 at the time and it was the only time that i ever seen anything like that !! thanks for reading.
content.summary: My son and i watched what looked like a star move accross the sky then looked like three legs or beams on each side then changed to red-orange then dissapear

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i had been at the hospital because my fater-in-law had been in a boating accident. it was the middle of a summer night, the sky was clear. we saw what we thought was a fireball coming from the horizon, but when it hovered over us we knew it wasn't. it glowed from within, made no noise and hovered for 5-10 seconds then droped straight down very fast and took off very fast to the east. my husband was not a believer in ufo's so the whole time it hovered he was saying " what the hell is that?" i said a ufo. i was very excited because it confirmed my believe that there are ufo's.I just saw a show on the "botswort"(?) incident not sure of spelling. i saw what we saw, so i decided to contact you. what i really would like to know is if others saw it. i'm sorry this is so vague, thought i'd take the chance.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Saw an object from ocean horizon coming very fast stopped over us dropped then went ver fast to the east.

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: Sugar loaf state park observing the stars. the objects were bigger than stars, smaller than the moon, but larger than any aircraft i've witnessed. the objects would suddenly pop up, and they would sit for minutes or even longer before they moved. i've witnessed this about 5 times now, and i've had witnesses with me 3 of the times. i knew these weren't stars or any type of aircraft i've seen since the first encounter. the sphere like shapes are bright gold/orange like a street light. they hover for minutes at a time, flashing on then suddenly disappearing... then multiple would appear in the same area in perfect formations, often triangular. the flight pattern is what throws me off. they have the ability to hover one way and change direction immediately and shoot off like a rocket, or drop up and down in the sky in a way a plane or helicopter could not. it has been pretty exciting yet nerve racking each occurrence. it's frustrating because nobody takes me seriously. the first time i saw this was when i was living in sonoma and my mom was with me and saw everything i saw. it was late at night when we went for a walk and i pointed the object out that was glowing like a street light. i knew it wasn't a star etc and we were near sonoma high. we were on the outdoor basketball court and i used the back board of the hoop to compare the light in the background to something stationary. i could clearly see it bobbing up and down and my mom wanted to go because she thought i was crazy. after convincing her to stay and watching for at least 10 minutes, it approached us and flew right over us. my mom was so convinced and scarred she hid us under a tree line. shortly after we noticed there were at least 5+ of the same lights scattered throughout the sky. in the last year i've witnessed this same situation but haven't had any fly over to where i could describe the detail of the noiseless craft that was very close above us. each time i've seen these they didn't disappear. i watched as long as the people i was with could bare or it'd be late at night and couldn't stay all night to watch. i don't have a video camera and my iphone wasn't able to pick up the footage in the dark. i hope you guys don't think this is bs i just got done watching your show.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: It was shocking! dogs in the area started going crazy

content.detailedDescription: In answer to your questions pat blume: i have not been able to contact you with email for some reason. very disappointing! and i wish i could just call you, much more easier and quicker. i remember the exact day because i was headed to greeley to take a drug teat for my new job in greeley that started the following monday. question #2, location of my sighting was the corner of sheridan, 36th, and butternut in loveland.  question #3, time was between 10:10 and 10:15.  question #4, direction of flight was approximately 135 degrees southeast from true north (i was a navigator in the navy)!!
content.summary: I already sent this!!!!!!!

content.detailedDescription: While traveling west on a roadway in wilmington n.C., i saw in the distance what i thought were two helicopters.  i noticed the objects were heading towards me and once i knew they were not helicopters, i pulled off to the side of the road and got out of my car.  i observed not two, but five round, reddish orange lights moving in line one right after the other.  they were spread apart but do not know how far.  they went directly over me and i could not hear any sound.  once the first object passed over me, it disappeared.  the other objects disappeared at the exact spot as the first.  it was a clear night, the  moon was almost full, and i could not see any clouds in the sky.  lived here my whole life and never seen anything like this before.
content.summary: 5 reddish, orange lights traveling in a straight line, no sound, disappeared one at a time overhead.

content.detailedDescription: There is a place in our county they call the goose pond woods, this story is the story that my mother handed down to me and all our cousins, as she had four sisters and the all were walking home from church in the years of 1919-1921....These woods have long been a haunting place as locals have said that horses would not travel through at night. it is said that one of the girls said "lord send us a light" and a large white light came down over the top of the trees and followed them all the way home.. the light was so bright you could have seen to pick up a needle my mother told me...I just wanted to put this on record because this was before planes, all my cousins know this tale from beginning to end...Tks kenneth wayne bailey
content.summary: Large white light acended over the tops of trees  and followed my mother and her four sisters home..Through the goose pond woods..

content.detailedDescription: On may fourth two thousand ten me and two of my friends benny and fro went fishing down at the treaty line ramp near liberty indiana. we wrapped up the fishing gear around five a.M.The following morning on may fifth. we parked the car in the third slot from the east end of the lot. after we packed everything in the car i started to the passenger side of car and in the corner of my eye i seen a light moving fast over the trees to the west. when i turned my head to look at it ,it stopped . i asked benny if he seen the light ,he said" yeah i see it. i sat down in the back seat and when i closed my door it moved south about 100 feet with no sway ,no sound. i told fro to get in and close the door see if it moved again and it did .I got back out of the car so did fro we stood there watching this light hover maneuver and hover over and over again .We started walking across the lot heading west toward the object .  another light was coming from below but it was like a flowing light down to the trees. and when it stopped at both points of its repetitive path a dull flash lit the hill under the craft.  i seen another couple fishing was packing up down at the ramp and as they drove by i stopped them and showed them the light, that's when it try to hide . i really mean it lowered as soon as i pointed at it but they saw it, it was behind the tree tallest on hill . my friend fro turned toward me and said it's gone i told him to look it was behind that tree and when i pointed it went down. i yelled "it landed" the couple in the car drove off real fast. fro and i got in his car and left also.  my feelings during this event were amazement at first then fear took over about what was going on and what will happen before its over. every year since i want to go back out there but most people i tell wont go out there . i need a team ,i need tech. support, i want to prepair for the next time. i know it returns i want to catch more than just footage that can be denied i want proof . i need proof . they were not trying to hide at first til i stopped that car . they were not scared of us. next time i will be ready. every single person in mufon i call to you .Help me if you want to stop the lies .
content.summary: It few in from north ,stopped hovered, moved from left to right stopping at about 50 to100 feet each time moved then dropped below tree line . it was scanning the woods.

content.detailedDescription: On april 3, 2013 at approximately 5:55am i  was loading my pick up truck at a motel in susanville, ca. when i noticed an object that had two lights on the rear end. it was just starting to get light. i could see that it was triangular in shape and travelling in a northeast to southwest direction. it was about 40 feet in diameter. it was going quite slow and appeared to be 1-2000 feet in elevation. it made no sound and i observed no omissions. i motioned to a neighbor who was also loading his truck. we watched it together for several minutes until it disappeared over the horizon.
content.summary: Dull triangle. dull with lights. fairly low
